participant_1.background:
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I currently rent my home.
i volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
i like the band queens of the stone age.

participant_2.background:
I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.
I remember buying my first police uniform.
I spend a lot of time playing with my cat.
i enjoy visiting national parks.
I'm a busy mom of two who is trying to find a healthy way to lose weight.

content.text: Hi there. How is your day going?
It is going pretty good. I just got back from the park with my kids.
That sounds fun. I have never been to a national park.
You should go! They are beautiful. I went to the Grand Canyon last year.
That sounds amazing. I would love to see that.
I am also a police officer.
That is interesting. I have never met a police officer before.
I am not sure if my family would accept me if I told them I was gay.
I am sure they would accept you. It is 2023. People are more accepting of the LGBTQ community now.
I hope so. I am afraid to tell them.
You should tell them. It will be a weight off your shoulders.
I do not know. I am scared of what they will say.
They will love you no matter what.
Thanks. I needed to hear that.
